        <script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) {

	if (!current.cmdb_ci.nil() && !current.asset.nil()) {
		if (!current.cmdb_ci.changes() && current.asset.changes()) {
			current.cmdb_ci = current.asset.ci;
			addAsset();
		}
		else if (current.cmdb_ci.changes() && !current.asset.changes()) {
			current.asset = current.cmdb_ci.asset;
			addAsset();
		}
		else if (current.cmdb_ci.changes() && current.asset.changes()) {
			if (current.asset != current.cmdb_ci.asset)
				abortBR();
			else
				addAsset();
		}
	}
	else if (current.cmdb_ci.nil() && current.asset.nil()) {
			removeAsset();
	}
	else if (current.cmdb_ci.nil() && !current.asset.nil()) {
		if (previous.cmdb_ci.nil() && current.asset.changes()) {
			current.cmdb_ci = current.asset.ci;
			addAsset();
		}
		else if (!previous.cmdb_ci.nil() && !current.asset.changes()) {
			current.asset = "";
			removeAsset();
		}
		else if (!previous.cmdb_ci.nil() && current.asset.changes()) {
			current.cmdb_ci = current.asset.ci;
			addAsset();
		}
	}
	else if (!current.cmdb_ci.nil() && current.asset.nil()) {
		if (!previous.cmdb_ci.nil() && current.asset.changes()) {
			current.cmdb_ci = "";
			removeAsset();
		}
		else if (previous.cmdb_ci.nil() && !current.asset.changes()) {
			current.asset = current.cmdb_ci.asset;
			addAsset();
		}
		else if (previous.cmdb_ci.nil() && current.asset.changes()) {
			current.asset = current.cmdb_ci.asset;
			addAsset();
		}
	}
}

function addAsset() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("task_asset");
	var qc = gr.addQuery("asset", previous.asset);
	qc.addOrCondition("asset", current.asset);
	gr.addQuery("task", current.sys_id);
	gr.query();
	if (!gr.next()) {
		gr.initialize();
		gr.setValue("asset", current.asset);
		gr.setValue("task", current.sys_id);
		gr.insert();
	}
	else {
		gr.setValue("asset", current.asset);
		gr.update();
	}	
}

function removeAsset() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("task_asset");
	var qc = gr.addQuery("asset", previous.asset);
	qc.addOrCondition("asset", current.asset);	
	gr.addQuery("task", current.sys_id);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next())
		gr.deleteRecord();		
}


function abortBR() {
	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Asset and CI are not matching"));
	current.setAbortAction(true);
}
